headline: Is APA’s 33% Rally Just the Start After Recent Cash Flow and Portfolio Moves?
summary: If you are wondering whether APA is still a value play after its latest run, or if you have missed the boat, this breakdown will help you decide whether the current price really stacks up against the fundamentals. The stock has climbed 8.5% over the last week, 13.7% over the past month, and 33.2% over the last year, but that comes after a choppy 3 year stretch. It is still down 27.8% over that period, even as the 5 year return sits at 92.2%. Recent headlines have focused on shifting energy...
